name: Rain (itch) (Alklord)
description:
A little adventure under the rain.

Rain takes you to a tinty world in a funny game between you and your little kids.


You are very small beings, take your kids to a safe place until the rain stops.

Controls: Use the arrows to move and hold LeftCtrl when you are close, to carry your kids to the center of the scenario.

 If the rain stops, you win as a father, if their health runs out... well, you can try many times as you want! 

I hope you like this little game!
